sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Down around the corner, half a mile from here
See them long trains run, and you watch them disappear
Without love, where would you be now

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: You know I saw miss Lucy down along the tracks
She lost her home and her family and she won't be coming back
Without love, where would you be right now

sections.name: Couplet!break
lyrics: Got to keep on pushin' mama
Without love, where would you be now

sections.name: Couplet!break
lyrics: Got to keep on pushin' mama
Without love, where would you be now

sections.name: Couplet!break fin ralentie Cm7
lyrics: Well the pistons keep on turning
And the wheels go round and round
The steel rails are cold and hard
For the miles that they go down
Without love, where would you be right now

sections.name: Outro!SOLO BASSE
lyrics: Mmm, got to get you, baby baby, won't you move it down?
Baby, baby, baby, baby, won't you move it down?
When the train is movin' on I got to keep on movin'

end: Appel drum pÃªches D# D G
